thread.title: Kirk Cousins reportedly will accept trade to only one team
thread.title_full: Kirk Cousins reportedly will accept trade to only one team

author: Scott Ridge (sridge@sportingnews.com)
title: Kirk Cousins reportedly will accept trade to only one team
text:
February 28, 2017 8:02am EST February 28, 2017 8:02am EST American Football, News, English, Kirk Cousins, NFL, Washington Redskins The Redskins quarterback is expected to be hit with a franchise tag later this week. Kirk Cousins (Getty Images) 
Updated at 8:02 a.m. ET 
Updated at 8:02 a.m. ET 
Kirk Cousins' value to the Redskins will become clearer Wednesday with the arrival of the franchise tag deadline. 
Washington can apply its tag to Cousins and still work out a long-term deal, or not. Another option is using the tag and trading its quarterback. 
One challenge, according to ESPN , is Cousins will only accept a trade to one team: the 49ers. The report cited an unnamed source. Read This
